name: Google Search
title: This quick reference cheat sheet lists of Google advanced search operators.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This quick reference cheat sheet lists of Google advanced search operators.

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Allows searching for a specific phrase - exact match search. Individual word prevents synonyms | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Boolean search function for OR searches as Google defaults to AND between words - must be all caps | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Implements OR | Basic

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Allows grouping of operators and helps dictate order | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Excludes a word from results | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Acts as a wildcard and will match any word or phrase | Basic

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: # represents a number in this instance. Use to find numbers in a series. | Basic

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Allows for search of USD | Basic

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Allows for search of Euro | Basic

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Allows searches for unit conversion (currency, unit or measure) | Basic

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Prefix - Include synonyms (potentially defunct) | Basic

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Prefix - Force exact match on single phrase | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: This is sandwiched between two words and the X declares how many words they must be mentioned between. I.e. if it’s (4) then the two keywords must be mentioned within 4 words of each other. | Advanced

cards.title: Google Advanced Search Operators
cards.back: Acts as wildcard for autocomplete | Advanced

cards.title: Search with url
cards.back: Only returns results where the queried keyword(s) is present in the URL | Advanced

cards.title: Search with url
cards.back: As above but only containing all of the specified words in the URL | Advanced

cards.title: Search with url
cards.back: Find blog URLs under a specific domain. This was used in Google blog search, but I’ve found it does return some results in regular search. | Advanced

cards.title: Search with url
cards.back: Limit results to those from one site | Advanced

cards.title: Search with url
cards.back: Find similar domains to the queried domain | Advanced

cards.title: Search with dates
cards.back: Return results in a specified range (requires julian dates) | Advanced

cards.title: Search with dates
cards.back: Allows you to search drive or mail for files modified or mail sent/received anytime after a set date | Drive,Mail

cards.title: Search with dates
cards.back: Allows you to search drive or mail for files modified or mail sent/received before a certain date | Drive,Mail

cards.title: Search with dates
cards.back: Search for messages older than a certain date | Mail

cards.title: Search with dates
cards.back: Search for messages newer than a certain date | Mail

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Search for messages with a particular type of file attached, or the exact name of a file | Mail

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Allows you to search drive by file type | Drive

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Allows you to search drive by owner of file or folder | Drive

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Allows you to search drive for files shared with a specific person | Drive

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Searches drive for files with the keyword in their title alone | Drive

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Allows you to search for files or folders shared with everyone in your business | Drive

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Returns only files of a particular type associated with the keyword searched | Advanced

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: As above, based on extension | Advanced

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Allows you to search drive or mail for files modified or mail sent/received anytime after a set date | Drive,Mail

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Allows you to search drive or mail for files modified or mail sent/received before a certain date | Drive,Mail

cards.title: Search files
cards.back: Searches for the item in the Drive bin | Drive

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Find pages that link to the target domain | Advanced

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Find pages linked to with the specified anchor text/ phrase. Data is heavily sampled. | Advanced

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Find pages with all individual terms after "inanchor:" in the inbound anchor text. | Advanced

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Returns pages based on the searched query appearing in their title | Advanced

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Similar to intitle: but only returns titles where all the words in the title match | Advanced

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Finds pages with keywords in their post titles (i.e. for researching blogs) |

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Finds pages where the keyword(s) are mentioned within the page content. | Advanced

cards.title: Search with page content
cards.back: Similar to “intext,” but only results containing all of the specified words somewhere on the page will be returned. | Advanced

cards.title: Keywords
cards.back: type E.g. cafe, restaurant, bar etc will return a selection of appropriate businesses in the are | Maps

cards.title: Keywords
cards.back: Station EV near me or perol station near me returns | Maps

cards.title: Keywords
cards.back: for a message with a google sheet attached | Mail

cards.title: Keywords
cards.back: for a message with a google presentation attached | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Prefix - Force exact match on single phrase | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Allows grouping of operators and helps dictate order | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Excludes a word from results | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Allows searching for a specific phrase - exact match search. Individual word prevents synonyms | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Boolean search function for OR searches as Google defaults to AND between words - must be all caps | Basic,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Allows you to search drive or mail for files modified or mail sent/received anytime after a set date | Drive,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Allows you to search drive or mail for files modified or mail sent/received before a certain date | Drive,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Searches only items that have been starred in drive | Drive,Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Specify the sender in google mail | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Specify the recipient in google mail | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search by a recipient that was copied into an email | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search by a recipient that was blind copied into an email | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages older than a certain date | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages newer than a certain date | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: for a message with a google sheet attached | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: for a message with a google presentation attached | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Similar to the normal google search function, allows you to search for keywords near each other. | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search by keywords featured in the subject line | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Use for OR in mail instead of the OR function | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages that have a certain label | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages that have an item attached | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages with a google drive attached | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages with a google doc attached | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for a message containing a youtube video | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for all messages from a particular mailing list | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Includes all folders in your search, including spam and bin | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages that have been marked as important | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Same as is:important | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Searches for messages that have been snoozed | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Searches for unread messages | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: searches for read messages only | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Searches for messages with coloured star icon | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Searches for messages with colourd icon | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Searches for messagse from chat | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search by email address for delivered messages | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Searches by messages based on category. Follow the colon with the categoy name, i.e. category:primary | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Messages larger than a certain size in bytes | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Messages larger than a certain size in bytes | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Messages smaller than a certain size in bytes | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages that have custom user labels | Mail

cards.title: Search on emails
cards.back: Search for messages that have no custom user labels | Mail

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Pulls a card response from Google displaying the dictionary definition of the word or phrase | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Returns the most up to date cache of an indexed web page | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Brings up the featured snipped for weather for that location | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Returns stock information for the specified ticker | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Force google map results for a particular query | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Find information for the specified movie (particularly useful when that movie has an ambiguous name). If the movie is still in theatres it’ll also return screen times | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Use in google news, returns results from the specified source | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Returns results for a specific location | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: As above but with Google news | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Returns information related to a domain (pages with domain text, similar on-site pages, cache etc) | Advanced

cards.title: Some other useful search operators
cards.back: Part of the google maps lazy searches e.g. book shops near work | Maps
